products.title: Trivium Hawk Arch T-Shirt
products.description: This Trivium Hawk Arch Tee features a hawk illustration printed in an arch design on the back. The Trivium T Logo is also printed on the front pocket area in the same light blue print on this unisex, crewneck t-shirt.

products.title: Trivium Cobra Skull T-Shirt
products.description: The Trivium 'Cobra Skull' design here is printed on a women's t-shirt.  The slim fit shirt has a more feminine cut than our unisex tees.

products.title: Trivium Rustic Oni T-Shirt
products.description: The Trivium 'Rustic Oni' design here is printed on a women's t-shirt.  The slim fit is made to hang a bit looser, but has a more feminine cut than our unisex tees.

products.title: Trivium Pillars T-Shirt
products.description: The Trivium 'Pillars T-Shirt' here features TRIVIUM and 'GIVE ME SPARK TO LIGHT THE WORLD UP IN FLAMES REIGNITE A CHANGING' in white text on the front of the design. This design is on a unisex black 100% cotton t-shirt.

products.title: Trivium Backpack
products.description: This Monster Patch Backpack from Trivium features a patch w/ the lyrics, Real Monsters Lie Between The Light And The Shade along with the Trivium logo.

products.title: Trivium Dad Hat
products.description: This Triangle Flame Dad Hat features the volcano logo embroidered in white on the front of a black dad hat. Trivium is embroidered above the adjustable strap on the back, and 'VIII' is featured on the side.

products.title: Trivium Knit Blanket
products.description: The Emblem Knit Blanket from Trivium features a collage of illustrated logos and graphics plus decorative fringe. The band name is also printed across the bottom. Perfect for picnics and outdoor concerts or as a fun statement throw blanket for your bed or couch at home.
